column4: Hey there I have an issue, I got no sound, anyone willing to help??
did you try alsamixer and unmute all the channels
I tired unmuting everything, didn't work unfortunately
if you open a konsole ... then alsamixer .. all the channels with 'MM' in front are still muted ... check this please
to unmute select the channel and press 'm'
it replied "function snd_ctl_open failed for default: No such file or directory" that bad??
probably your alsa drivers are not loaded correctly...
try lsmod | grep snd*
try lsmod | grep snd
k ill try
does it have any snd_ moules loaded (listed in grep)?
I did it, and then tried the alsmixer command again, It didnt work...
this won't load them ... just list them if they are loaded... the 'lsmod | grep snd' ... did it print out anything like snd_pcm ?
this is to check if your drivers are loaded correctly
well i dont see anything under snd_moules there
yes: snd_pcm                83076  5 snd_ice1724,snd_ac97_codec,snd_usb_audio,snd_pcm_oss,snd_ak4114
this is the problem ... your drivers aren't loaded ...
did you try /etc/init.d/alsa-utils start?
It says setting up ALSA and I have an Envy24PT/HT
huh??
alsa = advanced linux sound architecture ... this is not the nam of your card
huh?
